rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel pd.call.base.method, improve comments
axces.apm showing RAD loop when record has been modified before update
Panel pd.check.base.exit.1:
1. Modified exit panel bad.validation's condition for exit - From $L.exit="bad.val" or $L.exit="changed" - To $L.exit="changed"
2. Added exit panel reset.page.numbers and its condition for exit - $L.exit="bad.val"
QCCR1E123798, $L.phase value is incorrect on display when add incident but failed validation on default transition.
QCCR1E123743, Hybird PD Incident - Master format ctrl update is not executed when Close Incident.
[Performance Improvement] merge 2 save into 1 save for auto-transition
QCRQ1E104043, migrate legacy Incident module to hybrid Incident module
initial $L.reopen in start panel, otherwies it will always return false on panel check.sla.process on update condtion, then always invoke sla process.
And panel: check.sla.process
add more conditon to check affected.item as well on add and update.
add more conditon to check same downtime.start/end as well on update
size.check panel:
change
not rtecall("recordsizeok", $L.errcode, $L.new) and 10 in descriptor($L.new)~=-1
to
10 in descriptor($L.new)~=-1 and not rtecall("recordsizeok", $L.errcode, $L.new)
change size.check to decide.number in panel bad.validation
a) Panel(start): exits:normal changed from decide.number to decide.get.fc
b) Panel(add,update): exits:normal changed from size.check to decide.number
c) Panel(call.format.cadd,call.update.fc) exits:normal changed from size.check to decide.number
d) Panel(decide.number) exits:normal changed from decide.get.fc to size.check
e) Panel(get.number) exits:normal changed from decide.get.fc to size.check
on panel call.activity.check, changed exit for failed validation to bad.validation.activity
added panel bad.validation.activity and set $L.bad.validation.activity=true
added exit prep.check.master.fc for condition $L.background=true and $axces.bypass.failed.validation=true and nullsub($L.bad.validation.activity, false)=true
changed exit back to size.check with condition $L.background=true and $axces.bypass.failed.validation=true and nullsub($L.bad.validation.activity, false)=false
added panel $L.bad.validation.activity=false
On the check.sla.process panel, removed the 1st condition line checking the enable flag in $G.sla.environment (should be able to process outages regardless of whether or not SLA is licensed/enabled).
SCR39277 - Panel bad.validation
Changed the exit from 'size.check' to 'check.master.fc' (condition '$L.background=true and $axces.bypass.failed.validation=true')
Removed last condition on check.sla.process
Panel fc.select
Changed the 'no records' exit to get.object.record
devtx I3427
Modified panel=decide.check.outage so that if $L.background is true, we do not call RAD=sla.confirm.outage.
added exit to the decide.get.fc panel.
condition: null($L.fc)
Added: cust.visible in $L.file
for the "Customer Visible?" parm passed into sc.activity
changed calls to apm.activity to sc.activity, and moved the calls AFTER an add or update has been completed
More new SLA changes... put in outage confirmation screen.
recompile only
Added new SLA outage processing application.
changed problem management to incident management on get.number

Added processing to call sc.activity.update.check, called before format control processing on updates to see if activity recs will be generated, and if so, checks to see if an update to the ticket is required. Panels modified/created: decide, set.act.mode.check, call.activity.check, check.act.failed
Added the following to the start panel: $L.use.full.name=nullsub(full.name in $G.pm.global.environment, false); and added $L.use.full.name to the boolean1 parms on call.activity and call.activity.2.
Modified check.sla.process so that the call to outage calculation is processed on a resolve when using 2 step close (instead of waiting for closure).
panel: decide.call.fc.post.update
added to the condition for the 'call.fc.post.add' exit: " and not same($L.fc.master,$L.fc)"
pane: decide.call.fc.post.add
added to the condition for the 'call.fc.post.add' exit: " and not same($L.fc.master,$L.fc)"

Added processing to write an activity record for close if closing the ticket immediately from the apm.quick screen. Modified panels=setup.activity, call.activity. New panels=decide.activity.2, set.act.mode, call.activity.2
panel: call.master.fc
there was no value being passed in for the parameter 'save copy of database record'.
Set $L.old as the value being passed in.
updated the post.update and post.add panels to check for post subroutines in the master format control record. Check SCR for details of changes.
Changed the panel call.master.fc.add to call format.cadd instead of format.cupd.
Removed $L.new=true from the start panel of apm.save.problem.
Removed extraneous panels.

added calls to the problem object record so that the master format control could be extracted. Added calls to the master format control before the standard fc record was called. Did this for both the update and the add mode.
Removed Kasey's change for SCR 4469
Made changes to the paramater to add two new exits due to error found on IM00088 in the betat when testing SCD
changed other exits to go to decide.downtime from do.downtime.
Changed normal exit on panel post.update to decide.downtime from do.downtime.
In panel check.sla.process, added a fourth condition to check if the two step closure is used. If so, no need to call sla process twice during the close process.
added new rtecall recordsizeok, to check that the size of the file doesnt exceed user defined limit.
Changed reference to 3 in 3 in $L.new to Action,update.action in $L.new on the Start Panel.
Added nullsub of $axces.bypass.failed.validation to false for bad validation failure of format control
Restructured apm.save.problem to perform format control and size check processing prior to sla and contract processing.
Handles new cancel exit from sla.problem.process.
reimplemented call to apm.availability.schedule which replaces pm.avail.
Corrected condition where assignment change was not decrementing the counter if format control validation failure occured.
added code to allow bypass of failed format control validation in the background as an optional item. Variable set in the event registration record.
moved call to getnumb to beginning of the apm.save.problem. Completed in A9901 development system.
Reset page numbers after checking background.
Modified to use us.process.[parts&labor] as they are generalized for PM and CM3 use.
Move call to getnumb (Delay assigning number) after formatctrl call.
should now call labor processing
also now checks control settings before deciding whether or not to process parts/labor
should now call part processing
Converted to use scmsg().
SLA processing now handles the case when the logical.name has changed in the ticket.
Updated check on call to sla.problem.process to include new operational.device flag.
Moved the check on recordsize to before saving the record. This allows the user the chance to edit the record before the changes are lost. Only perform the check on P4 systems.
Now pops a message if a save failed because it was too big.
Use the paging value passed in.
will not throw outage start & end values for Y2K.unknown problem tickets (they aren't real problems)
Don't decrement the page number if paging is off.
Don't increment the page number if paging is off.
Removed the 'and $L.paging=false' from the fc update subrout. decision.
Removed the 'and $L.paging=false' from the update fc decision.
Now passes the background flag to sla.save.problem
Re-fixed sla.problem.process decision it wasn't posting outage data unless the problem ticket had a response time sla.
Fixed sla.problem.process decision
Added in sla.problem.process (if $L.background=false) right after start panel.
reset the page and total.pages fields if there is a format control validation failure.
Format control will now look for "problem" if none specific to that format exists
Fixed apm.save.problem so it worked with paging off add mode
Altered to enable downtime processing
Altered order of operations to new record e.g. $L.new is added prior to the update of the old record
fixed bug on getnumb where type was number rather
than string; also, $L.file did not exist - should
have been $L.new
fixed bug on start panel where $L.old is null
and is referenced on line 12

descript.descript: update panel pd.call.base.method, improve comments
axces.apm showing RAD loop when record has been modified before update
Panel pd.check.base.exit.1:
1. Modified exit panel bad.validation's condition for exit - From $L.exit="bad.val" or $L.exit="changed" - To $L.exit="changed"
2. Added exit panel reset.page.numbers and its condition for exit - $L.exit="bad.val"
QCCR1E123798, $L.phase value is incorrect on display when add incident but failed validation on default transition.
QCCR1E123743, Hybird PD Incident - Master format ctrl update is not executed when Close Incident.
[Performance Improvement] merge 2 save into 1 save for auto-transition
QCRQ1E104043, migrate legacy Incident module to hybrid Incident module
initial $L.reopen in start panel, otherwies it will always return false on panel check.sla.process on update condtion, then always invoke sla process.
And panel: check.sla.process
add more conditon to check affected.item as well on add and update.
size.check panel:
change
not rtecall("recordsizeok", $L.errcode, $L.new) and 10 in descriptor($L.new)~=-1
to
10 in descriptor($L.new)~=-1 and not rtecall("recordsizeok", $L.errcode, $L.new)
change size.check to decide.number in panel bad.validation
a) Panel(start): exits:normal changed from decide.number to decide.get.fc
b) Panel(add,update): exits:normal changed from size.check to decide.number
c) Panel(call.format.cadd,call.update.fc) exits:normal changed from size.check to decide.number
d) Panel(decide.number) exits:normal changed from decide.get.fc to size.check
e) Panel(get.number) exits:normal changed from decide.get.fc to size.check
on panel call.activity.check, changed exit for failed validation to bad.validation.activity
added panel bad.validation.activity and set $L.bad.validation.activity=true
added exit prep.check.master.fc for condition $L.background=true and $axces.bypass.failed.validation=true and nullsub($L.bad.validation.activity, false)=true
changed exit back to size.check with condition $L.background=true and $axces.bypass.failed.validation=true and nullsub($L.bad.validation.activity, false)=false
added panel $L.bad.validation.activity=false
On the check.sla.process panel, removed the 1st condition line checking the enable flag in $G.sla.environment (should be able to process outages regardless of whether or not SLA is licensed/enabled).
SCR39277 - Panel bad.validation
Changed the exit from 'size.check' to 'check.master.fc' (condition '$L.background=true and $axces.bypass.failed.validation=true')
Removed last condition on check.sla.process
Panel fc.select
Changed the 'no records' exit to get.object.record
devtx I3427
Modified panel=decide.check.outage so that if $L.background is true, we do not call RAD=sla.confirm.outage.
added exit to the decide.get.fc panel.
condition: null($L.fc)
Added: cust.visible in $L.file
for the "Customer Visible?" parm passed into sc.activity
changed calls to apm.activity to sc.activity, and moved the calls AFTER an add or update has been completed
More new SLA changes... put in outage confirmation screen.
recompile only
Added new SLA outage processing application.
changed problem management to incident management on get.number

Added processing to call sc.activity.update.check, called before format control processing on updates to see if activity recs will be generated, and if so, checks to see if an update to the ticket is required. Panels modified/created: decide, set.act.mode.check, call.activity.check, check.act.failed
Added the following to the start panel: $L.use.full.name=nullsub(full.name in $G.pm.global.environment, false); and added $L.use.full.name to the boolean1 parms on call.activity and call.activity.2.
Modified check.sla.process so that the call to outage calculation is processed on a resolve when using 2 step close (instead of waiting for closure).
panel: decide.call.fc.post.update
added to the condition for the 'call.fc.post.add' exit: " and not same($L.fc.master,$L.fc)"
pane: decide.call.fc.post.add
added to the condition for the 'call.fc.post.add' exit: " and not same($L.fc.master,$L.fc)"

Added processing to write an activity record for close if closing the ticket immediately from the apm.quick screen. Modified panels=setup.activity, call.activity. New panels=decide.activity.2, set.act.mode, call.activity.2
panel: call.master.fc
there was no value being passed in for the parameter 'save copy of database record'.
Set $L.old as the value being passed in.
updated the post.update and post.add panels to check for post subroutines in the master format control record. Check SCR for details of changes.
Changed the panel call.master.fc.add to call format.cadd instead of format.cupd.
Removed $L.new=true from the start panel of apm.save.problem.
Removed extraneous panels.

added calls to the problem object record so that the master format control could be extracted. Added calls to the master format control before the standard fc record was called. Did this for both the update and the add mode.
Removed Kasey's change for SCR 4469
Made changes to the paramater to add two new exits due to error found on IM00088 in the betat when testing SCD
changed other exits to go to decide.downtime from do.downtime.
Changed normal exit on panel post.update to decide.downtime from do.downtime.
In panel check.sla.process, added a fourth condition to check if the two step closure is used. If so, no need to call sla process twice during the close process.
added new rtecall recordsizeok, to check that the size of the file doesnt exceed user defined limit.
Changed reference to 3 in 3 in $L.new to Action,update.action in $L.new on the Start Panel.
Added nullsub of $axces.bypass.failed.validation to false for bad validation failure of format control
Restructured apm.save.problem to perform format control and size check processing prior to sla and contract processing.
Handles new cancel exit from sla.problem.process.
reimplemented call to apm.availability.schedule which replaces pm.avail.
Corrected condition where assignment change was not decrementing the counter if format control validation failure occured.
added code to allow bypass of failed format control validation in the background as an optional item. Variable set in the event registration record.
moved call to getnumb to beginning of the apm.save.problem. Completed in A9901 development system.
Reset page numbers after checking background.
Modified to use us.process.[parts&labor] as they are generalized for PM and CM3 use.
Move call to getnumb (Delay assigning number) after formatctrl call.
should now call labor processing
also now checks control settings before deciding whether or not to process parts/labor
should now call part processing
Converted to use scmsg().
SLA processing now handles the case when the logical.name has changed in the ticket.
Updated check on call to sla.problem.process to include new operational.device flag.
Moved the check on recordsize to before saving the record. This allows the user the chance to edit the record before the changes are lost. Only perform the check on P4 systems.
Now pops a message if a save failed because it was too bad
Use the paging value passed in.
will not throw outage start & end values for Y2K.unknown problem tickets (they aren't real problems)
Don't decrement the page number if paging is off.
Don't increment the page number if paging is off.
Removed the 'and $L.paging=false' from the fc update subrout. decision.
Removed the 'and $L.paging=false' from the update fc decision.
Now passes the background flag to sla.save.problem
Re-fixed sla.problem.process decision it wasn't posting outage data unless the problem ticket had a response time sla.
Fixed sla.problem.process decision
Added in sla.problem.process (if $L.background=false) right after start panel.
reset the page and total.pages fields if there is a format control validation failure.
Format control will now look for "problem" if none specific to that format exists
Fixed apm.save.problem so it worked with paging off add mode
Altered to enable downtime processing
Altered order of operations to new record e.g. $L.new is added prior to the update of the old record
fixed bug on getnumb where type was number rather
than string; also, $L.file did not exist - should
have been $L.new
fixed bug on start panel where $L.old is null
and is referenced on line 12
